title: By the King, a proclamation prohibiting the keeping of Exeter Fair, and other fairs thereabouts, for some time
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II)
publisher: printed by Charles Bill, Henry Hills, and Thomas Newcomb, printers to the King's most excellent Majesty,
notes: Dated at end: Whitehall the 16th day of November, 1688. ..
